motions.subject: THAT the City of Winnipeg direct the public service to immediately develop a solution to ensure grass is cut based on the growing cycle of lawns in our parks and on our boulevards by ensuring the frequency of mowing is increased when the grass actually grows rapidly, namely in the months of May, June, and early July, and to report to Council within 60 days of the steps taken to ensure this is done.
motions.disposition: AUTOMATIC REFERRAL TO THE STANDING POLICY COMMITTEE ON PROTECTION, COMMUNITY SERVICES AND PARKS

motions.subject: THAT Recommendation No. 1 of Item 9 of the Report of Executive Policy Committee dated May 11, 2016 be amended by adding the following name to serve as a member of the Board of Revision:  Don Mitchelson
motions.disposition: REFERRED TO THE EXECUTIVE POLICY COMMITTEE

motions.subject: THAT Councillor Browaty be granted a leave of absence from today’s meeting due to his absence from the City on City Business.

bylaws_passed.subject: To authorize the borrowing of money in the amount of up to $112,000,000.00
To approve a plan of subdivision and amend Winnipeg Zoning By-law No. 200/2006 to rezone land located at 113 St. Anne’s Road in the Riel Community. DASZ 36/2015
To allow enforcement of City by-laws under The Municipal By-law Enforcement Act
To approve a plan of subdivision for land located at 166, 176, 178, 180 and 184 Roslyn Road in the City Centre Community.
To amend Winnipeg Zoning By-law No. 200/2006 to rezone land located at 971 Main Street in the Lord Selkirk-West Kildonan Community. DAZ 223/2015

To approve a plan of subdivision and amend Winnipeg Zoning By-law No. 200/2006 to rezone land located on the West side of Litchfield Boulevard, south of Dearsley Place (formerly 845 Shaftsbury Boulevard) in the Assiniboia Community. DASZ 25/2015
To impose planning, development and building fees
To open Leila Avenue, west of Strasbourg Drive – DAO 1/2013
To close part of the public lane, Plan No. 11857 at the rear of 176 Roslyn Road. DAC 3/2015
To close part of Mission Street between Panet Road and Lagimodiere Boulevard and open the east side of Panet Road at Mission Street. DAOC 3/2014
To open the west side of Peguis Street, south of CPR Plan 1042. DAO 9/2015
To close part of Springfield Road between Dunits Drive and Chief Peguis Trail
To amend the Neighbourhood Liveability and the Vacant Buildings By-laws.
